languages.text: "Сдавайся, и получишь справедливый суд за свои прегрешения".
"Surrender, and you will be judged fairly for your transgressions."
languages.original_text: "Сдавайся, и получишь справедливый суд за свои прегрешения".

traits.locale_text: "Surrender, and you will be fairly judged for your transgressions."
"Surrender, and you will be fairly judged for your transgressions."
"Surrender, and you will be judged fairly for your transgressions."
"Surrender, and you will be judged fairly for your transgressions."
"Surrender, and you will be judged fairly for your transgressions."
"Surrender, and you will be judged fairly for your transgressions."

languages.text: "Ergebt Euch, und Ihr werdet für Eure Vergehen gerecht verurteilt."
languages.original_text: "Surrender, and you will be judged fairly for your transgressions."

traits.locale_text: "Ergebt Euch, und Ihr werdet für Eure Vergehen gerecht verurteilt."

languages.text: «Ríndete y tendrás un juicio justo por tus delitos».
languages.original_text: "Surrender, and you will be judged fairly for your transgressions."

traits.locale_text: «Ríndete y tendrás un juicio justo por tus delitos».

languages.text: 「降伏しろ。そうすれば、君の罪は公平に裁かれる」
languages.original_text: "Surrender, and you will be judged fairly for your transgressions."

traits.locale_text: 「降伏しろ。そうすれば、君の罪は公平に裁かれる」

languages.text: “立刻投降，你的罪行会得到公正的审判。”
languages.original_text: "Surrender, and you will be judged fairly for your transgressions."

traits.locale_text: “立刻投降，你的罪行会得到公正的审判。”

languages.text: « Rendez-vous et vous serez jugé équitablement pour vos transgressions. »
languages.original_text: "Surrender, and you will be judged fairly for your transgressions."

traits.locale_text: « Rendez-vous et vous serez jugé équitablement pour vos transgressions. »

languages.text: "Teslim olursan günahların için adil bir şekilde yargılanacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Surrender, and you will be judged fairly for your transgressions."
